bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Preferred Metric Units for Use in Electrical and Electronics Science and Technology
IEEE Recommended Practice for Preferred Metric Units for Use in Electrical and Electronics Science and Technology

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The purpose of this recommended practice is to aid in the selection of metric units so as to promote uniformity in the use of metric units and to limit the number of different metric units that will be used in electrical and electronics science and technology.<<ETX>>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
